DOC.brief_title: Prospective Data Collection Patients Undergoing Gynecologic Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: The aim prospective study collect data patient undergo gynecologic surgery Kangbuk Samsung Hospital . If patient agree participate clinical trial , patient 's data ( age , body mass index , preoperative finding , laboratory finding , radiologic finding , operative finding , pathologic finding , postoperative finding ) collect research database . The research database update , every 6 month , include data patient 's disease outcome follow-up care . Although data collect form medical record , patient may agin contacted researcher collection data medical record .
DOC.criteria: All patient undergo gynecologic surgery Kangbuk Samsung Hospital since March , 2015
